metadata.title: Implement Staff Manager API and Invite Flow
metadata.prd_reference: Feature 6 Staff Manager; Feature 7 Staff Invite

context.background: This task implements Implement Staff Manager API and Invite Flow for Healio and is scoped as one atomic work item aligned to the PRD. It should be completed within 45 mins and leave clear evidence for follow-on tasks.

design_constraints.constraint: Follow the PRD architecture/security conventions and keep outputs compatible with the Healio design system and response envelopes.

instruction.step: Implement the scoped changes for Implement Staff Manager API and Invite Flow in the planned files (healio/app/api/v1/staff/route.ts, healio/services/staffService.ts, healio/services/notificationService.ts, healio/emails/welcome.tsx) while preserving the PRD-aligned project structure.
Apply validation, error handling, and consistent response/UI behavior so the task output integrates cleanly with existing helpers and patterns.
Wire integrations and dependencies for this task (endpoints: GET /api/v1/staff, POST /api/v1/staff) and keep tenant scoping/RBAC/security expectations intact where applicable.
Add or update focused tests (unit/integration) for critical business rules, idempotency, or security behavior introduced by this task.
Document assumptions and any follow-on schema/API contracts in code comments or lightweight docs when they affect downstream tasks.

validation_checklist.check: Exercise the related endpoint(s): GET /api/v1/staff, POST /api/v1/staff and verify response shape/status codes.
Run lint/typecheck or the smallest relevant test suite for the files changed by this task.
Validate security/tenant behavior with at least one negative test or rejection scenario when applicable.
Record evidence of persistence/side effects (DB row change, log entry, webhook event handling, cache behavior, etc.) as applicable.

acceptance_criteria.criterion: The deliverable for Implement Staff Manager API and Invite Flow is implemented in the referenced files and compiles without breaking adjacent modules.
Task output matches the PRD scope (Feature 6 Staff Manager; Feature 7 Staff Invite) and remains bounded to an atomic <=45-minute implementation chunk.
Related endpoint behavior returns the standard success/error envelope and respects auth/public route expectations for the route class.
Business rules, tenant scoping, and security constraints relevant to this task are enforced (validation, idempotency, RBAC, webhook/cron protection, etc.).
At least one verification artifact (test case, curl call, or fixture-driven check) proves the new behavior works and regressions are covered.

execution_tracking.verification_command: npm run typecheck; node --import tsx --test tests/unit/staff-route.test.ts
execution_tracking.verification_notes: Implemented protected staff manager API (`GET /api/v1/staff`, `POST /api/v1/staff`) with OWNER/ADMIN invite permissions, tenant-scoped in-memory `staffService`, invite token generation, and invite email delivery via `renderWelcomeEmail` + `notificationService` (`STAFF_INVITE` notification type).

evidence.item: When work starts/completes, record changed files, test commands, screenshots (UI tasks), and commit/PR references here.
Changed files: healio/schemas/staff.ts, healio/services/staffService.ts, healio/app/api/v1/staff/route.ts, healio/tests/unit/staff-route.test.ts, healio/services/notificationService.ts.
Route verification: `GET /api/v1/staff` returns clinic-scoped staff list; `POST /api/v1/staff` creates an invited staff member (`201`) with invite token/expiry and invite email metadata.
Invite flow verification: staff invite triggers a `STAFF_INVITE` notification record with `SENT` status and expected recipient email in `notificationService` store.
Security/RBAC verification: missing auth returns `401`; FRONT_DESK invite attempt returns `403`; invalid invite payload returns `400`; duplicate email returns `409`.
Typecheck/tests passed: `npm run typecheck`; `node --import tsx --test tests/unit/staff-route.test.ts`.
Feature commit: dc95957 (feat(healio-auth): staff manager invite api).

execution_tracking.completion_signal: Task is done only when state=DONE, is_done=true, completed_at is filled, verification_status=PASSED, and evidence records changed files/tests/screenshots as applicable.
